Third, in the context of global warming, MMT may increase in the future
9, 30– 34 (Fig. 5). The existing prediction that global warming will lead to an increase in heat-related mortality and a decrease in cold-related mortality is based on unchanged MMT or MMP, may be questionable
36– 38 . Instead of using unchanging MMT, future MMT predicted by future MFT might provide more precise predictions on the mortality risks/burden due to ambient temperatures.
